android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTER.description: Permission an application must hold in order to use

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.description: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to change the state of network connectivity.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description: Allows an application to view configuration of the local Bluetooth phone and to make and accept connections with paired devices.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.description: Allows an application to configure the local Bluetooth phone and to discover and pair with remote devices.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

manifest_analysis.title:
Clear text traffic is Enabled For App
[android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: The app intends to use cleartext network traffic, such as cleartext HTTP, FTP stacks, DownloadManager, and MediaPlayer. The default value for apps that target API level 27 or lower is "true". Apps that target API level 28 or higher default to "false". The key reason for avoiding cleartext traffic is the lack of confidentiality, authenticity, and protections against tampering; a network attacker can eavesdrop on transmitted data and also modify it without being detected.
manifest_analysis.name: Clear text traffic is Enabled For App [android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.stitcher.app.MD_BentoBox) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.

playstore_details.title: Stitcher - Podcast Player
playstore_details.description:
Stitcher is a free podcast app, it’s home to all your favorite podcasts and easy to navigate features. Explore shows from NPR, Wondery, WNYC, the New York Times, Earwolf, Exactly Right, and more. We offer over 260,000 podcasts, from politics, true crime, sports, and comedy, there’s a podcast for everyone on Stitcher.

Stream and organize your podcasts with our free app. Find shows about politics, comedy, true crime including classics like This American Life, The Daily, Radiolab, and Joe Rogan. You can listen to our podcasts anytime, anywhere.

Stitcher also has exclusive back catalog podcast episodes of My Favorite Murder, WTF with Marc Maron, True Crime Garage, Conan O’Brien Needs A Friend and many more Earwolf shows plus ad-free, original content on Stitcher Premium, like the Marvel comics based, Wolverine: The Long Night. And ad free versions of many podcasts including Dirty John and Dr. Death plus most Wondery shows. 

P.S. If you liked Howl, you’ll love Stitcher. 


 Organize Your Podcasts
Use Stitcher to favorite as many podcasts as you listen to so you never miss a new episode or update 

 Stream Podcasts on Demand 
Stream instantly or download podcasts to easily listen offline

Custom Podcast Playlists
Create podcast playlists so you always have a collection of podcasts episodes ready for work, your commute, or an upcoming road trip!

Exclusive Premium Podcasts and Ad Free Shows
Subscribe to Stitcher Premium for exclusive content from podcasts you love and Stitcher Original shows.

Smart Speaker Integrations
Now features an Amazon Alexa skill and connects to Sonos speaker systems to play podcasts easily throughout your home or office.

Android Auto and Other In-Car Play
Supports Android Auto and integrations with over 50 other car models from Ford, GM, Mazda and many more. As well as Waze navigation app integrated play.

Awards 🏆
- Top 5 Podcast Apps - TIME Magazine
- 12 Best Entertainment Apps - PC World
- 20 Best Podcast Apps - TechCrunch
- 25 Top Android Apps - TIME Magazine

How to Get Started 🎧
1. Install the free Stitcher app
2. Sign in with Google, Facebook or your email
3. Start listening!


Stitcher features all the popular podcasts:
My Favorite Murder with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark, and The Joe Rogan Experience. Stitcher Originals like Freakonomics, You Must Remember This, Dead Ass, and Science Rules with Bill Nye. Office Ladies by Earwolf, Conan O’Brien Needs a Friend from Earwolf and Team Coco, Comedy Bang Bang by Earwolf, as well as other Earwolf shows like Yo, is this racist, Scam Goddess, How Did This Get Made, Best Friends with Nicole Byer and Sasheer Zamata, Hollywood Handbook, and Getting Curious with Jonathan Van Ness.  Dr. Death, Dirty John, and Bad Batch from Wondery. Today Explained from Vox, The Daily, Still Processing, and 1619 from The New York Times. All of NPR’s podcasts like Life Kit, Planet Money, Pop Culture Happy Hour, Hidden Brain and Wait Wait Don’t Tell Me. CarStuff, Unobscured, and Broken Harts from iHeartRadio. BBC presents Missing Crypto Queen, Brexitcast, and Intrigue. The Bill Simmons Podcast, Binge Mode, and the press box from The Ringer. Stitcher Originals such as By the Book, Marvel’s Wolverine, The Sporkful, and Mob Queens.
playstore_details.summary: Stitcher is a free and easy to navigate podcast app with over 260,000 podcasts.
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Stitcher is a free and easy to navigate podcast app with over 260,000 podcasts.
playstore_details.developerAddress:
Stitcher
250 Montgomery Street
15th Floor
San Francisco, CA 94104
playstore_details.recentChanges:
Stitcher 4.7.0.1453
 
 A few more fixes that you requested...
 
- Issue with audio still playing on phone after disconnecting from Bluetooth devices, e.g. car, headphones
- Crash upon casting to some Chromecast devices
- Updated Download Notification & app banner with number of episodes remaining
- Homepage issues
- Android Auto episode image flickering
 
 Still seeing issues? Go to Settings in the app and tap the Help button. Thanks for reporting issues - it helps a ton!
playstore_details.recentChangesHTML:
Stitcher 4.7.0.1453

A few more fixes that you requested...

- Issue with audio still playing on phone after disconnecting from Bluetooth devices, e.g. car, headphones
- Crash upon casting to some Chromecast devices
- Updated Download Notification & app banner with number of episodes remaining
- Homepage issues
- Android Auto episode image flickering

Still seeing issues? Go to Settings in the app and tap the Help button. Thanks for reporting issues - it helps a ton!
